title: Tuscan-style ornate characters in monogram
content:
Hi there, I have searched everywhere for this font?  
Can anyone assist? Much appreciated for your time!!  
j

comments.content:
That looks like a custom designed monogram to me. There might be something similar, but I doubt you will find an exact match.

- Lex
